1: הַאֲזִ֥ינוּ <sup>238 </sup> <n>Give ear</n> הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>O ye heavens</n> וַאֲדַבֵּ֑רָה <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and I will speak</n> וְתִשְׁמַ֥ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>and hear</n> הָאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>O earth</n> אִמְרֵי־ <sup>561 </sup> <n>the words</n> פִֽי׃ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>of my mouth</n>
2: יַעֲרֹ֤ף <sup>6201 </sup> <n>shall drop</n> כַּמָּטָר֙ <sup>4306 </sup> <n>as the rain</n> לִקְחִ֔י <sup>3948 </sup> <n>My doctrine</n> תִּזַּ֥ל <sup>5140 </sup> <n>shall distil</n> כַּטַּ֖ל <sup>2919 </sup> <n>as the dew</n> אִמְרָתִ֑י <sup>565 </sup> <n>my speech</n> כִּשְׂעִירִ֣ם <sup>8164 </sup> <n>as the small rain</n> עֲלֵי־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> דֶ֔שֶׁא <sup>1877 </sup> <n>upon the tender herb</n> וְכִרְבִיבִ֖ים <sup>7241 </sup> <n>and as the showers</n> עֲלֵי־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> עֵֽשֶׂב׃ <sup>6212 </sup> <n>upon the grass</n>
3: כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> שֵׁ֥ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>the name</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֶקְרָ֑א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>Because I will publish</n> הָב֥וּ <sup>3051 </sup> <n>ascribe</n> גֹ֖דֶל <sup>1433 </sup> <n>ye greatness</n> לֵאלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>unto our God</n>
4: הַצּוּר֙ <sup>6697 </sup> <n>[He is] the Rock</n> תָּמִ֣ים <sup>8549 </sup> <n>[is] perfect</n> פָּעֳל֔וֹ <sup>6467 </sup> <n>his work</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>for all</n> דְּרָכָ֖יו <sup>1870 </sup> <n>for all his ways</n> מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>[are] judgment</n> אֵ֤ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>a God</n> אֱמוּנָה֙ <sup>530 </sup> <n>of truth</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and without</n> עָ֔וֶל <sup>5766 </sup> <n>and without iniquity</n> צַדִּ֥יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>just</n> וְיָשָׁ֖ר <sup>3477 </sup> <n>and right</n> הֽוּא׃ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>They</n>
5: שִׁחֵ֥ת <sup>7843 </sup> <n>They have corrupted</n> ל֛וֹ לֹ֖א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> בָּנָ֣יו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>[is] not [the spot] of his children</n> מוּמָ֑ם <sup>3971 </sup> <n>themselves their spot</n> דּ֥וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>generation</n> עִקֵּ֖שׁ <sup>6141 </sup> <n>[they are] a perverse</n> וּפְתַלְתֹּֽל׃ <sup>6618 </sup> <n>and crooked</n>
6: הֲ־ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> לַיְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> תִּגְמְלוּ־ <sup>1580 </sup> <n>Do ye thus requite</n> זֹ֔את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> עַ֥ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> נָבָ֖ל <sup>5036 </sup> <n>O foolish</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> חָכָ֑ם <sup>2450 </sup> <n>cunning</n> הֲלוֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> הוּא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> אָבִ֣יךָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>fathers</n> קָּנֶ֔ךָ <sup>7069 </sup> <n>[that] hath bought</n> ה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>He</n> עָֽשְׂךָ֖ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>thee? hath he not made</n> וַֽיְכֹנְנֶֽךָ׃ <sup>3559 </sup> <n>thee and established</n>
7: זְכֹר֙ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>Remember</n> יְמ֣וֹת <sup>3117 </sup> <n>the days</n> עוֹלָ֔ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>of old</n> בִּ֖ינוּ <sup>995 </sup> <n>consider</n> שְׁנ֣וֹת <sup>8141 </sup> <n>the years</n> דּוֹר־ <sup>1755 </sup> <n>of many</n> וָד֑וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>generations</n> שְׁאַ֤ל <sup>7592 </sup> <n>ask</n> אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <sup>1 </sup> <n>thy father</n> וְיַגֵּ֔דְךָ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>and he will shew</n> זְקֵנֶ֖יךָ <sup>2205 </sup> <n>thee thy elders</n> וְיֹ֥אמְרוּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and they will tell</n> לָֽךְ׃
8: בְּהַנְחֵ֤ל <sup>5157 </sup> <n>their inheritance</n> עֶלְיוֹן֙ <sup>5945 </sup> <n>When the most High</n> גּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>to the nations</n> בְּהַפְרִיד֖וֹ <sup>6504 </sup> <n>when he separated</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the sons</n> אָדָ֑ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of Adam</n> יַצֵּב֙ <sup>5324 </sup> <n>he set</n> גְּבֻלֹ֣ת <sup>1367 </sup> <n>the bounds</n> עַמִּ֔ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> לְמִסְפַּ֖ר <sup>4557 </sup> <n>according to the number</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
9: כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> חֵ֥לֶק <sup>2506 </sup> <n>portion</n> יְהֹוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>For the LORD'S</n> עַמּ֑וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>[is] his people</n> יַעֲקֹ֖ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>Jacob</n> חֶ֥בֶל <sup>2256 </sup> <n>[is] the lot</n> נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>of his inheritance</n>
10: יִמְצָאֵ֙הוּ֙ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>He found</n> בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>land</n> מִדְבָּ֔ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>him in a desert</n> וּבְתֹ֖הוּ <sup>8414 </sup> <n>and in the waste</n> יְלֵ֣ל <sup>3214 </sup> <n>howling</n> יְשִׁמֹ֑ן <sup>3452 </sup> <n>wilderness</n> יְסֹֽבְבֶ֙נְהוּ֙ <sup>5437 </sup> <n>he led him about</n> יְב֣וֹנְנֵ֔הוּ <sup>995 </sup> <n>he instructed</n> יִצְּרֶ֖נְהוּ <sup>5341 </sup> <n>him he kept</n> כְּאִישׁ֥וֹן <sup>380 </sup> <n>him as the apple</n> עֵינֽוֹ׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>of his eye</n>
11: כְּנֶ֙שֶׁר֙ <sup>5404 </sup> <n>As an eagle</n> יָעִ֣יר <sup>5782 </sup> <n>stirreth up</n> קִנּ֔וֹ <sup>7064 </sup> <n>her nest</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> גּוֹזָלָ֖יו <sup>1469 </sup> <n>over her young</n> יְרַחֵ֑ף <sup>7363 </sup> <n>fluttereth</n> יִפְרֹ֤שׂ <sup>6566 </sup> <n>spreadeth abroad</n> כְּנָפָיו֙ <sup>3671 </sup> <n>her wings</n> יִקָּחֵ֔הוּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>taketh</n> יִשָּׂאֵ֖הוּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>them beareth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> אֶבְרָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>84 </sup> <n>them on her wings</n>
12: יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[So] the LORD</n> בָּדָ֣ד <sup>910 </sup> <n>alone</n> יַנְחֶ֑נּוּ <sup>5148 </sup> <n>did lead</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and there</n> עִמּ֖וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> אֵ֥ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>god</n> נֵכָֽר׃ <sup>5236 </sup> <n>him and [there was] no strange</n>
13: יַרְכִּבֵ֙הוּ֙ <sup>7392 </sup> <n>He made him ride</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> [בָּמֹותֵי כ] (בָּ֣מֳתֵי <sup>1116 </sup> <n>height</n> ק) אָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> וַיֹּאכַ֖ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>that he might eat</n> תְּנוּבֹ֣ת <sup>8570 </sup> <n>the increase</n> שָׂדָ֑י <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the fields</n> וַיֵּנִקֵ֤הֽוּ <sup>3243 </sup> <n>and he made him to suck</n> דְבַשׁ֙ <sup>1706 </sup> <n>honey</n> מִסֶּ֔לַע <sup>5553 </sup> <n>out of the rock</n> וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <sup>8081 </sup> <n>and oil</n> מֵחַלְמִ֥ישׁ <sup>2496 </sup> <n>out of the flinty</n> צֽוּר׃ <sup>6697 </sup> <n>rock</n>
14: חֶמְאַ֨ת <sup>2529 </sup> <n>Butter</n> בָּקָ֜ר <sup>1241 </sup> <n>of kine</n> וַחֲלֵ֣ב <sup>2461 </sup> <n>and milk</n> צֹ֗אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>of sheep</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>With</n> חֵ֨לֶב <sup>2459 </sup> <n>with fat</n> כָּרִ֜ים <sup>3733 </sup> <n>of lambs</n> וְאֵילִ֤ים <sup>352 </sup> <n>and rams</n> בְּנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the breed</n> בָשָׁן֙ <sup>1316 </sup> <n>of Bashan</n> וְעַתּוּדִ֔ים <sup>6260 </sup> <n>and goats</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>With</n> חֵ֖לֶב <sup>2459 </sup> <n>with the fat</n> כִּלְי֣וֹת <sup>3629 </sup> <n>of kidneys</n> חִטָּ֑ה <sup>2406 </sup> <n>of wheat</n> וְדַם־ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>blood</n> עֵנָ֖ב <sup>6025 </sup> <n>of the grape</n> תִּשְׁתֶּה־ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and thou didst drink</n> חָֽמֶר׃ <sup>2561 </sup> <n>the pure</n>
15: וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ן <sup>8080 </sup> <n>waxed fat</n> יְשֻׁרוּן֙ <sup>3484 </sup> <n>But Jeshurun</n> וַיִּבְעָ֔ט <sup>1163 </sup> <n>and kicked</n> שָׁמַ֖נְתָּ <sup>8080 </sup> <n>thou art waxen fat</n> עָבִ֣יתָ <sup>5666 </sup> <n>thou art grown thick</n> כָּשִׂ֑יתָ <sup>3780 </sup> <n>thou art covered</n> וַיִּטֹּשׁ֙ <sup>5203 </sup> <n>[with fatness] then he forsook</n> אֱל֣וֹהַ <sup>433 </sup> <n>God</n> עָשָׂ֔הוּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[which] made</n> וַיְנַבֵּ֖ל <sup>5034 </sup> <n>him and lightly esteemed</n> צ֥וּר <sup>6697 </sup> <n>the Rock</n> יְשֻׁעָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>3444 </sup> <n>of his salvation</n>
16: יַקְנִאֻ֖הוּ <sup>7065 </sup> <n>They provoked him to jealousy</n> בְּזָרִ֑ים <sup>2114 </sup> <n>with strange</n> בְּתוֹעֵבֹ֖ת <sup>8441 </sup> <n>[gods] with abominations</n> יַכְעִיסֻֽהוּ׃ <sup>3707 </sup> <n>provoked they him to anger</n>
17: יִזְבְּח֗וּ <sup>2076 </sup> <n>They sacrificed</n> לַשֵּׁדִים֙ <sup>7700 </sup> <n>unto devils</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>were not</n> אֱלֹ֔הַ <sup>433 </sup> <n>not to God</n> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>to gods</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> יְדָע֑וּם <sup>3045 </sup> <n>whom they knew</n> חֲדָשִׁים֙ <sup>2319 </sup> <n>not to new</n> מִקָּרֹ֣ב <sup>7138 </sup> <n>newly</n> בָּ֔אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>up</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> שְׂעָר֖וּם <sup>8175 </sup> <n>feared</n> אֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>whom your fathers</n>
18: צ֥וּר <sup>6697 </sup> <n>Of the Rock</n> יְלָדְךָ֖ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>[that] begat</n> תֶּ֑שִׁי <sup>7876 </sup> <n>thee thou art unmindful</n> וַתִּשְׁכַּ֖ח <sup>7911 </sup> <n>and hast forgotten</n> אֵ֥ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> מְחֹלְלֶֽךָ׃ <sup>2342 </sup> <n>that formed</n>
19: וַיַּ֥רְא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And when the LORD</n> וַיִּנְאָ֑ץ <sup>5006 </sup> <n>[it] he abhorred</n> מִכַּ֥עַס <sup>3708 </sup> <n>[them] because of the provoking</n> בָּנָ֖יו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of his sons</n> וּבְנֹתָֽיו׃ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and of his daughters</n>
20: וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> אַסְתִּ֤ירָה <sup>5641 </sup> <n>I will hide</n> פָנַי֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>my face</n> מֵהֶ֔ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> אֶרְאֶ֖ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>from them I will see</n> מָ֣ה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>what</n> אַחֲרִיתָ֑ם <sup>319 </sup> <n>what their end</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> ד֤וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>generation</n> תַּהְפֻּכֹת֙ <sup>8419 </sup> <n>[shall be] for they [are] a very froward</n> הֵ֔מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> בָּנִ֖ים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>children</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is no</n> אֵמֻ֥ן <sup>529 </sup> <n>in whom [is] no faith</n> בָּֽם׃
21: הֵ֚ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>They</n> קִנְא֣וּנִי <sup>7065 </sup> <n>They have moved me to jealousy</n> בְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>with [that which is] not</n> אֵ֔ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> כִּעֲס֖וּנִי <sup>3707 </sup> <n>they have provoked me to anger</n> בְּהַבְלֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>1892 </sup> <n>with their vanities</n> וַאֲנִי֙ <sup>589 </sup> <n>Me</n> אַקְנִיאֵ֣ם <sup>7065 </sup> <n>and I will move them to jealousy</n> בְּלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>are not</n> עָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>with [those which are] not a people</n> בְּג֥וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nation</n> נָבָ֖ל <sup>5036 </sup> <n>with a foolish</n> אַכְעִיסֵֽם׃ <sup>3707 </sup> <n>I will provoke them to anger</n>
22: כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> אֵשׁ֙ <sup>784 </sup> <n>For a fire</n> קָדְחָ֣ה <sup>6919 </sup> <n>is kindled</n> בְאַפִּ֔י <sup>639 </sup> <n>in mine anger</n> וַתִּיקַ֖ד <sup>3344 </sup> <n>and shall burn</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> שְׁא֣וֹל <sup>7585 </sup> <n>hell</n> תַּחְתִּ֑ית <sup>8482 </sup> <n>unto the lowest</n> וַתֹּ֤אכַל <sup>398 </sup> <n>and shall consume</n> אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n> וִֽיבֻלָ֔הּ <sup>2981 </sup> <n>with her increase</n> וַתְּלַהֵ֖ט <sup>3857 </sup> <n>and set on fire</n> מוֹסְדֵ֥י <sup>4146 </sup> <n>foundation</n> הָרִֽים׃ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>of the mountains</n>
23: אַסְפֶּ֥ה <sup>5595 </sup> <n>I will heap</n> עָלֵ֖ימוֹ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> רָע֑וֹת <sup>7451 </sup> <n>mischiefs</n> חִצַּ֖י <sup>2671 </sup> <n>mine arrows</n> אֲכַלֶּה־ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>upon them I will spend</n> בָּֽם׃
24: מְזֵ֥י <sup>4198 </sup> <n>[They shall be] burnt</n> רָעָ֛ב <sup>7458 </sup> <n>with hunger</n> וּלְחֻ֥מֵי <sup>3898 </sup> <n>and devoured</n> רֶ֖שֶׁף <sup>7565 </sup> <n>with burning heat</n> וְקֶ֣טֶב <sup>6986 </sup> <n>destruction</n> מְרִירִ֑י <sup>4815 </sup> <n>and with bitter</n> וְשֶׁן־ <sup>8127 </sup> <n>the teeth</n> בְּהֵמוֹת֙ <sup>929 </sup> <n>of beasts</n> אֲשַׁלַּח־ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>I will also send</n> בָּ֔ם עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>With</n> חֲמַ֖ת <sup>2534 </sup> <n>upon them with the poison</n> זֹחֲלֵ֥י <sup>2119 </sup> <n>of serpents</n> עָפָֽר׃ <sup>6083 </sup> <n>of the dust</n>
25: מִחוּץ֙ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>without</n> תְּשַׁכֶּל־ <sup>7921 </sup> <n>shall destroy</n> חֶ֔רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>The sword</n> וּמֵחֲדָרִ֖ים <sup>2315 </sup> <n>within</n> אֵימָ֑ה <sup>367 </sup> <n>and terror</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>again</n> בָּחוּר֙ <sup>970 </sup> <n>both the young man</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>again</n> בְּתוּלָ֔ה <sup>1330 </sup> <n>and the virgin</n> יוֹנֵ֖ק <sup>3243 </sup> <n>the suckling</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>[also] with the man</n> שֵׂיבָֽה׃ <sup>7872 </sup> <n>of gray hairs</n>
26: אָמַ֖רְתִּי <sup>559 </sup> <n>I said</n> אַפְאֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>6284 </sup> <n>I would scatter them into corners</n> אַשְׁבִּ֥יתָה <sup>7673 </sup> <n>of them to cease</n> מֵאֱנ֖וֹשׁ <sup>582 </sup> <n>from among men</n> זִכְרָֽם׃ <sup>2143 </sup> <n>I would make the remembrance</n>
27: לוּלֵ֗י <sup>3884 </sup> <n>Were it not</n> כַּ֤עַס <sup>3708 </sup> <n>the wrath</n> אוֹיֵב֙ <sup>341 </sup> <n>of the enemy</n> אָג֔וּר <sup>1481 </sup> <n>that I feared</n> פֶּֽן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>lest</n> יְנַכְּר֖וּ <sup>5234 </sup> <n>should behave themselves strangely</n> צָרֵ֑ימוֹ <sup>6862 </sup> <n>lest their adversaries</n> פֶּן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>would</n> יֹֽאמְרוּ֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>[and] lest they should say</n> יָדֵ֣ינוּ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>Our hand</n> רָ֔מָה <sup>7311 </sup> <n>[is] high</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> פָּעַ֥ל <sup>6466 </sup> <n>hath not done</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> זֹֽאת׃ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n>
28: כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>are a</n> ג֛וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>For they [are] a nation</n> אֹבַ֥ד <sup>6 </sup> <n>void</n> עֵצ֖וֹת <sup>6098 </sup> <n>of counsel</n> הֵ֑מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and there</n> בָּהֶ֖ם תְּבוּנָֽה׃ <sup>8394 </sup> <n>neither [is there any] understanding</n>
29: ל֥וּ <sup>3863 </sup> <n>O that</n> חָכְמ֖וּ <sup>2449 </sup> <n>they were wise</n> יַשְׂכִּ֣ילוּ <sup>7919 </sup> <n>[that] they understood</n> זֹ֑את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>would</n> יָבִ֖ינוּ <sup>995 </sup> <n>this [that] they would consider</n> לְאַחֲרִיתָֽם׃ <sup>319 </sup> <n>their latter end</n>

33: חֲמַ֥ת <sup>2534 </sup> <n>[is] the poison</n> תַּנִּינִ֖ם <sup>8577 </sup> <n>of dragons</n> יֵינָ֑ם <sup>3196 </sup> <n>Their wine</n> וְרֹ֥אשׁ <sup>7219 </sup> <n>venom</n> פְּתָנִ֖ים <sup>6620 </sup> <n>of asps</n> אַכְזָֽר׃ <sup>393 </sup> <n>and the cruel</n>
34: הֲלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> כָּמֻ֣ס <sup>3647 </sup> <n>[Is] not this laid up in store</n> עִמָּדִ֑י <sup>5978 </sup> <n>Me</n> חָתֻ֖ם <sup>2856 </sup> <n>with me [and] sealed up</n> בְּאוֹצְרֹתָֽי׃ <sup>214 </sup> <n>treasure</n>

37: וְאָמַ֖ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he shall say</n> אֵ֣י <sup>335 </sup> <n>Where</n> אֱלֹהֵ֑ימוֹ <sup>430 </sup> <n>Where [are] their gods</n> צ֖וּר <sup>6697 </sup> <n>[their] rock</n> חָסָ֥יוּ <sup>2620 </sup> <n>in whom they trusted</n> בֽוֹ׃
